dct_title_s: DER NEUEN WEST BEGRIFF Bestehende in 2 Haubt Theilen als NORD AMERICA und SUD AMERICA, Warinnen der Erste Meridian nach Hollandischer art gezogen
dct_description_sm: California with flat northern coastline. Partial coastline of New Zeeland and other tropical landforms are shown. Four medallions with portraits of R.P. Tachard S.I.G., D. Cavillus de Saile. G, Christ: Colum:Gen:, and Drac Anglus surround map
California with flat northern coastline. Partial coastline of New Zeeland and other tropical landforms are shown. Without medallions.

Without medallions, with complete New Guinee coastline and additional nearby islands, with Land von Jesso and Japon, and with title word "Hollandischer" changed to "Frantzosischer". California with indented northern coastline.
Title along map top. Western Hemisphere with California as an island.
